title: My Birthday and 2 Year League Anniversary!
body: Today is my birthday, and while I'm not sure of my exact start date at league I know it's also around this time because I started playing several days before Yasuo's release (12-13-13). I just wanted to say thank you to Riot for such a great gaming experience and a fun time for these two years, and hopefully many more to go! Annnnd thanks to the community for keeping the game alive, even if it's a bunch of negative Nancys!

replies.body:
Happy Birthday! Hope you have an awesome day! ^-^ 

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/r0ZFEqzXbM0/maxresdefault.jpg
I haven't seen that splash since season 4, and I own it..
Well soon you'll actually be able to use it!
Runic Echoes might just bring him back.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ya5nXdBy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-08T21:17:21.365+0000)
>
> Happy Birthday! Hope you have an awesome day! ^-^ 
> 
> https://i.ytimg.com/vi/r0ZFEqzXbM0/maxresdefault.jpg

Thank you KateyKhaos! Snow Day Syndra is arriving a couple days late, but totally going to be my birthday present to myself! I'm super excited for it! I hope you have an awesome day as well!

TMW it's your birthday, your 4th year playing League, Riot gives you a random Riot skin because they happen to be streaming, your favorite LCS team wins some game, a Riot employee plays your 2000th match with you and you win, and a guy on your friends list gives you a free $20 of RP...all on the same day

best day ever?

> [{quoted}](name=crasherX8,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ya5nXdBy,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-12-09T03:13:17.834+0000)

> 
> best day ever?

Pfffffffft, I wish. And I am only on win like 975.. Way away from 2000 lol.
